<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Kaava Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1436)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Kaava hunting parties can number in the dozens, although they blend easily into the forest and cover all traces of their passage. While community elders assign various tasks to hunting parties, such as recovering food or deterring intruders, the parties are expected to accomplish these tasks as they see fit.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Kaava Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1436)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 300 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +7; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Trackless** A kaava moving at half their Speed or less steps so lightly that they leave virtually no trace. The DCs of checks to [Track](/Actions.aspx?ID=66) a kaava are increased by 10.

**Items**
[obsidian sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9), [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Resistances**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sickle +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +8,
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +9 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Skulking Attack**   If a kaava stalker starts their turn [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) by a creature, that creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the kaava's attacks until the end of the turn.

</column>
